metadata.Title: CVE-2011-3620 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache Qpid 0.12 does not properly verify credentials during the joining of a cluster, which allows remote attackers to obtain access to the messaging functionality and job functionality of a cluster by leveraging knowledge of a cluster-username.

notes.Note: ebarretto> From Debian: "Red Hat-specific extension, see bug #672124"

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
